Australia needs fairer solutions Nov 25, 2025 Engineering Division of Equity Diversity & Inclusion Science & Tech General Opinion Research Networks and partnerships Healthy lives Prosperity SDG SDG3 SDG9 SDG11 All news Our degrees Undergraduate Choose from a variety of undergraduate specialisations. Your career opportunities will be enhanced through our strong industry partnerships, industrial training program, real-world knowledge. Postgraduate Continue your study with our range of postgraduate specialisations, suitable for building a career in both Australia and overseas. Postgraduate research Take advantage of our top-level facilities to contribute new and significant knowledge within your chosen discipline. We offer the the Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) and the Master of Philosophy (MPhil). Research & impact Our research At UNSW Engineering, we hold the quality of our research to the highest academic standards addressing the global challenges facing society and delivering positive, real-world impact. Our researchers are part of strong, interdisciplinary teams driving creativity, innovation and industry transformation. Research centres & institutes Our world class research centres and institutes are developing strategies and technologies to help us overcome some of the key challenges facing society today. Explore our diverse research themes and see how our research is transforming the future, locally and internationally. Research grants & funding We are proud of our reputation as a leading research faculty. Our outstanding track-record of Australian Research Council (ARC) grants, as well as our funding from state and federal government bodies ensures our research makes an impact. We continue to grow and strengthen our reputation throughout Australia and the world.
